programme.title: Para Roma Com Amor
programme.desc: As vidas de turistas e moradores em Roma, os seus romances, aventuras e também os imprevistos que lhes acontecem.

programme.title: Casa de Doidas
programme.desc: O dono de um cabaré gay e o seu companheiro, uma 'drag queen', concordam em fazer-se passar por heterossexuais para que o seu filho possa apresentá-los aos pais da noiva.

programme.title: Minorca
programme.desc: Depois de esconder um diamante roubado no saco de uma mulher, Calvin, que mais do que anão tem o tamanho de um bebé, deve infiltrar-se na casa dela para o reaver.

programme.title: Morte Num Funeral
programme.desc: A cerimónia fúnebre de um pai de família é perturbada por uma série de incidentes, bem como pelas revelações de um desconhecido a propósito do defunto.

programme.title: Valquíria
programme.desc: Ao ver Hitler precipitar a Alemanha e a Europa para o caos, o coronel Stauffenberg começa a acreditar que é preciso travá-lo. Em 1943, quando recupera de ferimentos sofridos em combate, reúne forças junto da Resistência Alemã e organiza uma conspiração para matar Hitler: a "Operação Valquíria".

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Jules e Vincent, dois assassinos, tentam recuperar uma mala roubada de Marsellus Wallace. Este pede ainda a Vincent para tomar conta da mulher, Mia. Butch, um pugilista, é pago por Wallace para perder um combate. Já Honey Bunny e Pumpkin, um casal de pequenos ladrões, quer uma mudança de sítio.

programme.title: Força Maior
programme.desc: Uma família sueca viaja para os Alpes Franceses para esquiar. No entanto, durante o almoço na montanha, uma avalanche provoca o caos. A mãe chama pelo seu marido Tomas, enquanto tenta proteger os filhos. Mas Tomas está a fugir para se salvar.

programme.title: Uma Criança Como Jake
programme.desc: Jake é um menino de quatro anos que prefere brincadeiras com princesas. Mas, na escola, a sua interação com o mundo revela algo mais complexo e os pais terão de refletir sobre a possibilidade de Jack ter nascido num corpo que não corresponde à sua identidade.

programme.title: The Road Ahead
programme.desc: Liam está prestes a divorciar-se quando a sua mulher Mia é diagnosticada com um cancro. Ela propõe uma viagem para recuperarem a relação e a saúde.

programme.title: A Comuna
programme.desc: Nos anos 70, o casal Erik e Anna realiza um sonho e, juntamente com a filha, monta uma comuna em Copenhaga. Há amizade, amor e vida em conjunto debaixo do mesmo teto, até que um devastador caso de amor sujeita a comuna ao seu maior teste.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1471491/","name":"Jeff Davis"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Criminal Minds: Drive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2969812249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Criminal Minds: Drive"}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1471491/","name":"Jeff Davis"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Criminal Minds: Drive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2969812249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Criminal Minds: Drive"}}</script><metacontent="

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: O Quinto Poder
programme.desc: O fundador da Wikileaks, Julian Assange, e Daniel Domscheit-Berg, juntam-se para vigiar de forma anónima pessoas influentes e poderosas. Em pouco tempo, libertam mais notícias bombásticas do que todas as grandes empresas de media do mundo.

programme.title: Os Filhos do Homem
programme.desc: Em 2027, o ser humano está à beira da extinção: os homens perderam a capacidade de procriar e, por algum motivo que se desconhece, as mulheres tornaram-se estéreis. Ao mesmo tempo, o mundo estremece quando morre um jovem de 18 anos, a pessoa mais jovem do planeta. A situação é caótica.

programme.title: Mechanic: Assassino Profissional
programme.desc: Quando Arthur Bishop julgava que os seus dias como assassino eram coisa do passado, é forçado a voltar ao ativo quando Gina, o amor da sua vida, é raptada pelo seu inimigo mais perigoso. Mas na mira estão nomes, aparentemente, impossíveis de eliminar.

IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Uma Guerra Pessoal
programme.desc: Marie Colvin é uma das correspondentes de guerra mais famosas do nosso tempo. Um espírito rebelde que percorre conflitos em todo o mundo, dando voz aos que não a têm. Rebelde e corajosa, Colvin sacrifica relações amorosas e, ao longo do tempo, tudo aquilo que viu afeta irremediavelmente a sua vida.

programme.title: Verdade
programme.desc: A investigação do programa "60 Minutes II" revelou provas que comprovariam que o Presidente George W. Bush tinha evitado cumprir o serviço militar, entre 1968 e 1974. Um trabalho que custou aos jornalistas Dan Rather e a Mary Mapes as suas carreiras.

programme.title: 6 Dias
programme.desc: Em abril de 1980, homens armados invadiram a Embaixada do Irão, em Londres. A história verdadeira dos seis dias de terror aquando da ocupação, que resultou em 26 reféns.

programme.title: Causa Justa
programme.desc: Paul Armstrong é um reputado professor de Direito em Harvard, empenhado na luta contra a pena de morte. Instigado pela mulher, decide investigar o caso de Bobby Earl Ferguson, um condenado no corredor da morte por um homicídio ocorrido oito anos antes. Terá sido mesmo ele?

programme.title: Um Avô Muito à Frente
programme.desc: Jason Kelly está a uma semana de casar com a filha do seu super controlador chefe. Mas quando o bem comportado Jason se encarrega de levar o seu avô depravado, Dick, a Daytona para umas férias, as suas núpcias ficam subitamente em perigo.

programme.title: Decisão Crítica
programme.desc: Quando um grupo terrorista desvia um avião, ameaçando fazê-lo explodir a não ser que o seu líder seja libertado, ficará a cargo do agente David Grant descobrir qual dos passageiros tem o detonador e impedir o massacre.

programme.title: Olhos Grandes
programme.desc: No final dos anos 1950, o pintor Walter Keane alcançou um sucesso inacreditável com as suas pinturas de crianças com olhos grandes. A chocante verdade acaba, no entanto, por ser descoberta: as obras de Walter eram criadas pela sua mulher, Margaret.

programme.title: O Agente da U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Nos anos 60, um agente da CIA e um espião do KGB são forçados a colocar as suas diferenças de parte, juntando-se numa missão que visa travar uma misteriosa organização criminosa internacional, empenhada na proliferação das armas nucleares.

programme.title: Para Além dos Limites
programme.desc: Michael é um vigarista ambicioso que elabora um plano para roubar um casino de luxo na Europa. No entanto, quando está prestes a alcançar o objetivo, encontra pela frente um enigmático rival e, misteriosamente, perde tudo vendo o seu plano desmascarado.

programme.title: Os Produtores
programme.desc: Um produtor da Broadway, à beira da falência, e um contabilista tímido concebem um projeto desonesto com o intuito de enriquecer rapidamente. O objetivo passa por criarem o pior espetáculo do mundo.

programme.title: A Ilha das Cabeças Cortadas
programme.desc: Morgan, uma mulher dedicada à pirataria, herdou um barco, uma tripulação de bandidos e a terceira parte de um mapa que está escrito em latim. Para resolver o problema, compra um escravo educado e versado em latim, William Shaw, mas descobre que há mais alguém a seguir a pista do tesouro.

programme.title: Pânico no Túnel
programme.desc: O pânico instala-se quando, num túnel de Nova Iorque, há um desmoronamento na ligação entre Manhattan e Nova Jérsia, na sequência de uma explosão. Entretanto, um homem lidera as pessoas presas no interior e tenta que todos consigam sair em segurança.

programme.title: Mar de Chamas
programme.desc: Dois irmãos bombeiros, que não gostam um do outro, vão ter que trabalhar juntos para apanhar um incendiário criminoso.

programme.title: A Decisão Mortal
programme.desc: Anna e Tom querem começar uma família, mas vivem dificuldades económicas. Até ao dia em que descobrem o seu inquilino morto e um saco cheio de dinheiro em casa dele. Ao guardar segredo e ficar com o dinheiro, o casal torna-se um alvo a abater.

programme.title: Golpe de Amor
programme.desc: Um casal divorciado descobre que o dinheiro do seu plano de reforma foi roubado e concebe um plano para recuperá-lo. Os dois veem-se envolvidos numa perseguição por toda a Europa, num turbilhão de intrigas, perseguições loucas e roubos.

programme.title: Livrai-nos do Mal
programme.desc: Sarchie, um oficial da Polícia de Nova Iorque, começa a investigar uma série de crimes perturbantes e inexplicáveis. Alia-se a um padre pouco convencional, experiente nos rituais do exorcismo, para combater as terríveis e demoníacas possessões que aterrorizam a sua cidade.

programme.title: Oh Não! Outro Filme de Adolescentes
programme.desc: Para encerrar o curso com chave de ouro, um dos finalistas de uma escola aposta que fará de Janey, a mais improvável e impopular das suas colegas, a rainha do Baile de Finalistas.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Golpes
programme.desc: Jack, um surfista e trapaceiro de segunda, que vai vivendo dos "trabalhinhos" que faz no Havai, conhece uma bela mulher que tem um plano infalível para fazer fortuna. Tudo que Jack tem de fazer é entrar numa casa pobre... e sair um homem rico.

programme.title: Mapas Para as Estrelas
programme.desc: Uma viagem ao coração de uma família de Hollywood e ao mundo supérfluo e tortuoso das celebridades egoístas e dos seus assistentes. Ao mesmo tempo que se procuram a si próprios, à fama e aos fantasmas do passado.

programme.title: O Último Golpe
programme.desc: James deve a vida que tem ao irmão mais velho, Frankie, que foi preso por um crime que os dois cometeram. Entretanto, James trabalhou para dar uma volta à sua vida e deixar o crime. Agora, Frankie está de novo nas ruas, sem dinheiro e sem sítio onde ficar.

programme.title: A Rapariga No Comboio
programme.desc: Rachel fantasia com a vida aparentemente perfeita de um casal, que vive do outro lado da linha do comboio que apanha diariamente. Quando, da janela, observa algo que a perturba, vê-se envolvida na investigação de uma pessoa desaparecida...

programme.title: Causa Justa
programme.desc: Paul Armstrong é um reputado professor de Direito em Harvard, empenhado na luta contra a pena de morte. Instigado pela mulher, decide investigar o caso de Bobby Earl Ferguson, um condenado no corredor da morte por um homicídio ocorrido oito anos antes. Terá sido mesmo ele?

programme.title: Um Avô Muito à Frente
programme.desc: Jason Kelly está a uma semana de casar com a filha do seu super controlador chefe. Mas quando o bem comportado Jason se encarrega de levar o seu avô depravado, Dick, a Daytona para umas férias, as suas núpcias ficam subitamente em perigo.

programme.title: Suburbicon
programme.desc: No verão de 1959, a família Lodge muda-se para Suburbicon. Mas a fachada de tranquilidade da vizinhança esconde uma realidade perturbadora e Gardner Lodge terá de navegar os bastidores sombrios dos subúrbios, as suas traições, mentiras e violência.

programme.title: Livrai-nos do Mal
programme.desc: Sarchie, um oficial da Polícia de Nova Iorque, começa a investigar uma série de crimes perturbantes e inexplicáveis. Alia-se a um padre pouco convencional, experiente nos rituais do exorcismo, para combater as terríveis e demoníacas possessões que aterrorizam a sua cidade.

programme.title: Golpe no Paraíso
programme.desc: Após a realização de um último e bem-sucedido golpe, o cabecilha do gangue decide retirar-se para uma ilha paradisíaca. Na tentativa de assegurar que ele está a cumprir com o que prometera, o astuto agente do FBI decide seguir-lhe o rasto e os dois entram num novo jogo de gato e rato.

programme.title: A Chave do Sucesso
programme.desc: Três vendedores num quarto de hotel a reflectir sobre a vida num divertido e envolvente confronto.

programme.title: A Teoria de Tudo
programme.desc: A extraordinária história de uma das mentes mais brilhantes dos nossos tempos, o astrofísico Stephen Hawking, e de duas pessoas que, por amor, desafiam todas as probabilidades. O filme é baseado nas memórias de Jane Hawking.

programme.title: Golpada Americana
programme.desc: Na década de 70, o vigarista Irving Rosenfeld e a sua sedutora parceira são forçados a trabalhar como informadores para um agente do FBI, numa missão que envolve o perigoso mundo do crime e da máfia de Nova Jérsia. O filme é baseado em factos reais.

programme.title: O Sorriso das Estrelas
programme.desc: Numa estalagem, uma mãe de família, que se encontra em processo de divórcio, e um cirurgião, que acaba de sofrer, também ele, um grande trauma, apaixonam-se.

programme.title: Querida Eleanor
programme.desc: Em 1962, durante o caos da crise dos mísseis em Cuba, duas adolescentes viajam através dos Estados Unidos em busca de Eleanor Roosevelt.

programme.title: Antes do Adeus
programme.desc: Nick e Brooke, dois estranhos, conhecem-se quando ficam retidos em Nova Iorque. Um encontro acidental que se transforma em algo mais, quando os dois se tornam confidentes um do outro, durante uma noite de inesperadas aventuras.

programme.title: Outlander
Outlander

programme.title: The Night Shift: Turno da Noite
The Night Shift: Turno da Noite
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dança Feroz
programme.desc: Após a morte da mãe, o cubano Rafael Infante vai para Houston trabalhar na escola de dança de John Burnett. Faz limpezas e pequenos serviços, enquanto observa os dançarinos e se apaixona por Ruby, que sonha vencer o Campeonato Mundial de Las Vegas, mesmo que, para isso, tenha de abrir mão do amor.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Contagem para a Morte
programme.desc: Quando um estimado dono de supermercado é morto, a dona de restaurantes e chef da televisão Billie Blessing envolve-se na investigação do que parece ser a obra de um assassino em série inteligente e sinistro.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Morte por Medida
programme.desc: A melhor amiga da chef Billie Blessing, Marian, é contratada para redecorar o estúdio de televisão. Quando a irmã gémea de Marian é assassinada, Billie tem de investigar os amigos chegados delas para descobrir o assassino.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: La Curiosité Est Un Vilain Défaut
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter","dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: A Minha Namorada Tem Amnésia
programme.desc: Henry Roth, um biólogo marinho do Havai, encontra todas as desculpas para não se comprometer com as mulheres com quem sai. No entanto, ao conhecer a mulher dos seus sonhos, a encantadora Lucy Whitmore, descobre também um problema para a relação: quando Lucy se levanta de manhã, perde a memória.

programme.title: A Vingança Serve-se Fria
programme.desc: Um romântico incurável acredita ter encontrado o verdadeiro amor numa mulher mais velha, até descobrir que esta é casada e apenas se quer vingar do seu marido negligente.

programme.title: A História de uma Vaqueira
programme.desc: Dusty Rhodes, uma jovem vaqueira do Texas, e o avô apoiam-se na sua fé e um no outro enquanto os pais dela combatem na Guerra do Afeganistão.

Outlander

programme.title: The Night Shift: Turno da Noite
The Night Shift: Turno da Noite
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: La Nuit, Tous Les Chats Sont Gris
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vida Interrompida
programme.desc: Susanna é internada num hospital psiquiátrico, onde acaba por se tornar amiga de outras pacientes. Entre elas está Lisa, uma sociopata sedutora que tenta organizar uma fuga. O filme é baseado na experiência da escritora Susanna Kaysen, que esteve internada durante 18 meses, nos anos 60.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Morte por Medida
programme.desc: A melhor amiga da chef Billie Blessing, Marian, é contratada para redecorar o estúdio de televisão. Quando a irmã gémea de Marian é assassinada, Billie tem de investigar os amigos chegados delas para descobrir o assassino.

programme.title: Darrow & Darrow
programme.desc: Claire Darrow é uma mãe solteira e advogada que quer sempre fazer o que está certo. Quando um amigo próximo é condenado por assaltar uma joalharia, cabe a Claire fazer justiça.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. programme.title: O Sorriso de Mona Lisa
programme.desc: Em 1953, uma professora de História da Arte num colégio para raparigas tenta alargar os estreitos horizontes das suas brilhantes alunas. O maior desafio será fazer com que as estudantes encontrem (e assumam) a sua identidade cultural, partindo da visão ampla e desafiante dos novos conhecimentos.

programme.title: Um Coração Selvagem
programme.desc: Sailor e Lula são um casal de jovens amantes em fuga das diabólicas artimanhas da mãe dela, numa das mais bizarras e fascinantes jornadas de todos os tempos.

programme.title: Upgrade: Máquina Assassina
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo, a tecnologia controla quase todos os aspetos da vida. Mas quando Grey, avesso às novas tecnologias, vê o seu mundo virado ao contrário, a única esperança de vingança que tem reside num chip de computador experimental, chamado Stem.

programme.title: Plano B
programme.desc: Quando o agente dos serviços secretos Vic Davis vai buscar o filho à universidade, percebe que há um rapto prestes a acontecer. A vítima é uma colega do rapaz, filha de um juiz do Supremo Tribunal, e os malfeitores não vão parar até a terem para usá-la como vantagem negocial.

programme.title: O Quarto dos Desejos
programme.desc: Matt e Kate descobrem um quarto secreto na nova casa, que lhes concede todos os desejos materiais. O quarto dá-lhes tudo o que desejam, até que um dia pedem o que mais anseiam... Um filho. O que no início parece um sonho, depressa se transforma em pesadelo.

programme.title: Souvenir
programme.desc: Lilianne Cheverny foi uma cantora célebre na década de 70, que atingiu o apogeu quando representou França no Eurofestival da Canção com o tema "Souvenir". Só que a fama desvaneceu-se e ela agora trabalha numa fábrica, onde há um jovem que a reconhece e que quer voltar a fazer dela uma estrela.

programme.title: William
programme.desc: Julian Reed e Barbara Sullivan criam um bebé Neandertal, utilizando ADN de um cadáver mumificado de um antigo Neandertal. William tem de aprender a viver num mundo onde é o derradeiro marginal, o único Neandertal no planeta.

programme.title: Fahrenheit 11/9
programme.desc: Visão cómica e provocadora dos tempos que vivemos. Explora as duas questões cruciais da "Era Trump": como viemos aqui parar? Como saímos nós daqui?

programme.title: Os Anjos de Charlie: Potência Máxima
programme.desc: O trio prepara-se para recuperar duas alianças: mas não são uns anéis quaisquer. Contêm informação encriptada que revela informações preciosas acerca de pessoas inseridas no programa de proteção de testemunhas. Quando as testemunhas começam a morrer, só os Anjos podem travar o assassino.

programme.title: O Professor Chanfrado
programme.desc: O professor de genética Sherman Klump tem excesso de peso e, desesperado para conquistar a bela Carla, bebe um soro experimental para emagrecer. Sherman transforma-se em "Buddy Love", um conversador, energético e esbelto Don Juan!

programme.title: Segurança Nacional
programme.desc: Eles têm apenas uma coisa em comum: foram rejeitados pelo Departamento de Polícia de Los Angeles! Um foi expulso e o outro nem foi admitido. Mas quando Earl e Hank se juntam como seguranças, ninguém está seguro! Juntos, mas não por opção, têm debaixo de olho o homem que matou o parceiro de Hank.

programme.title: Loucos e Fãs
programme.desc: Em 1998, um grupo de fãs da saga "Star Wars" viaja até ao Rancho Skywalker para roubar uma cópia do, então ainda por estrear, "Star Wars: Episódio I - A Ameaça Fantasma".

programme.title: Estranhas Revelações
programme.desc: Um jornalista especializado em assassinatos violentos descobre o corpo mutilado da sua nova namorada e encontra um diário que revela as futuras vítimas do assassino em série. Hicks decide antecipar o assassino e evitar mais mortes antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Upgrade: Máquina Assassina
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo, a tecnologia controla quase todos os aspetos da vida. Mas quando Grey, avesso às novas tecnologias, vê o seu mundo virado ao contrário, a única esperança de vingança que tem reside num chip de computador experimental, chamado Stem.

programme.title: Alvo Letal
programme.desc: Quando Luke Gibson quase perde a vida num acidente, a Hexx Corporation insere-lhe um implante no cérebro para o salvar. Só que se rapidamente percebe que essa nova tecnologia tem um preço muito alto.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: Red e Mandy levam uma vida tranquila numa cabana isolada junto a um lago do Colorado. Um dia, a sua casa é invadida por membros de uma seita religiosa que matam Mandy e deixam Red à beira da morte. Traumatizado, apenas uma coisa o mantém preso à vida: um intenso desejo de punir os responsáveis.

programme.title: Icarus, Máquina de Guerra
programme.desc: Edward Genn, nome de código Icarus, é um assassino treinado do KGB que trabalhou durante anos como um agente adormecido da América. No entanto, quando o Império Soviético ruiu, viu-se isolado num país estrangeiro e sem ninguém em quem confiar.

programme.title: Iris
programme.desc: A vida da brilhante escritora inglesa Iris Murdoch e a sua 'imersão' na doença de Alzheimer. A sua história desde que se casou com o inteletual John Bayley até à sua morte.

programme.title: Festa de Família
programme.desc: No dia do seu aniversário, Andrea uma surpresa inesperada: a filha mais velha, Claire, que esteve desaparecida durante três anos, regressa e está determinada em receber tudo aquilo a que tem direito. Uma verdadeira surpresa de aniversário que vai causar uma tempestade no seio da família...

programme.title: O Sol da Meia Noite
programme.desc: Nikolai 'Kolya' Rodchenko é um grande bailarino que desertou da União Soviética e vive nos EUA. Quando o avião em que viaja é forçado a aterrar na Sibéria, ele é repatriado à força e fica com um dançarino de sapateado americano que optou pela via comunista. Será que ele o vai ajudar a fugir?

programme.title: Rogue Warfare: A Arte da Guerra
programme.desc: Um grupo de combate elite junta os melhores militares dos exércitos norte-americano, russo, britânico, chinês e francês para enfrentar uma rede terrorista absolutamente letal.

programme.title: O Professor Chanfrado
programme.desc: O professor de genética Sherman Klump tem excesso de peso e, desesperado para conquistar a bela Carla, bebe um soro experimental para emagrecer. Sherman transforma-se em "Buddy Love", um conversador, energético e esbelto Don Juan!

programme.title: A Legião dos Duros
programme.desc: Em Marselha, em 1925, Alain é um pugilista que é contratado por um mafioso para perder um combate. Quando não cumpre o acordado, vê-se forçado a fugir e acaba por se alistar na Legião Estrangeira e ser enviado para combater em Marrocos.

programme.title: O Medalhão
programme.desc: O detetive Eddie Yang sofre um acidente e morre, mas volta à vida com a ajuda de um medalhão, que dá poderes sobrenaturais ao seu detentor. Em conjunto com uma agente da Interpol, Eddie vai tentar descobrir os segredos do artefacto e derrotar o malvado "Cabeça de Cobra".

programme.title: Equipa Mortal
programme.desc: Melvin Smiley é um assassino neurótico e absolutamente banal que trabalha para dois chefes criminosos. Um deles propõe ao stressado Melvin que rapte Keiko, a filha mais nova de um abastado industrial japonês, sem saber que ela é a afilhada do outro.

programme.title: Noite Sangrenta
programme.desc: Na noite de 19 de outubro de 1921, um grupo de marinheiros e guardas republicanos percorre as ruas de Lisboa, na chamada Camioneta Fantasma. Várias figuras políticas e militares são assassinadas na chamada "Noite Sangrenta" e uma mulher vai tentar descobrir toda a verdade.

programme.title: Os Tradutores
programme.desc: Nove pessoas, contratadas para traduzir o livro final de uma trilogia de grande sucesso, estão confinadas num bunker. Mas quando as primeiras páginas do manuscrito secreto aparecem online, as suspeitas recaem sobre os tradutores – e o editor fará tudo para encontrar o culpado.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." Truer words....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2534388761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." programme.desc: NCIS: Los Angeles: Created by Shane Brennan. With Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah, LL Cool J, Linda Hunt. The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1378167/","name":"NCIS: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQzNGIzNmEtNWE3ZS00OTUyLTg3YTEtMDY3NDViZWE0YWY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. Now I want to watch stories about people who are unique and unusual and earthy and human.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-09-22","keywords":"copaganda,shared universe,spinoff,punctuation in title,male protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2079733/","name":"Daniela Ruah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005112/","name":"LL Cool J"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285100/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107402/","name":"Shane Brennan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326248985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show.
